actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of constructing a project to supply municipal, rural, and industrial water to expand the capacity and reach of the Lewis and Clark Regional Water System in the States of Iowa, Minnesota, and South Dakota.
short_title: Lewis and Clark Regional Water System Expansion Feasibility Study Act

titles.title: Lewis and Clark Regional Water System Expansion Feasibility Study Act
Lewis and Clark Regional Water System Expansion Feasibility Study Act

To require the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of constructing a project to supply municipal, rural, and industrial water to expand the capacity and reach of the Lewis and Clark Regional Water System in the States of Iowa, Minnesota, and South Dakota.
